PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2000-13322000-08-230,  ,  ,  FIN, 
PrecisApproval for the Minister of Finance to enter into an ADMINISTRATION AGREEMENT (Sales Tax Collection Agreement) with the COWICHAN BAND concerning the collection by the Government of Canada, on behalf of the Band, of an ad valorem tax (7%) on sales of fuel, alcohol and tobacco products that occur on their reserves.
Attachments
